db:abstract.db:para: Adds dates and times to a chart's axis.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The DateTimeAxis type can be set up to show an axis line with tick marks, grid lines, and shades. The axis labels display dates and times and can be configured by setting an appropriate DateTime format.

db:note.db:para: Any date before 4714 BCE or after about 1.4 million CE may not be accurately stored.

db:section.db:title: format : string
db:section.db:para: The format string that is used when creating the label for the axis out of a QDateTime object. See QDateTime documentation for information on how the string should be defined.

db:section.db:title: max : datetime
db:section.db:para: The maximum value on the axis.
When setting this property, the minimum value is adjusted if necessary, to ensure that the range remains valid.

db:section.db:title: min : datetime
db:section.db:para: The minimum value on the axis.
When setting this property, the maximum value is adjusted if necessary, to ensure that the range remains valid.

db:section.db:title: tickCount : int
db:section.db:para: The number of tick marks on the axis.
